title: Can we drink water after Wudu
transcript: if she performs woudl and before she engages in salat she feels that thirsty so can she drink the answer you can drink you can eat you can do whatever you want once you perform although this doesn't mean you have to immediately pray no I can perform Moodle and go to work have breakfast read the newspaper chat with the people and then Prelude her afterwards as long as I did not break my wood oh you can do whatever you want
